faq.heading: Do you have questions?
faq.description: We are here for you if you want to know more!

courses.ronny_introduction:
Ronny Hollenstein has worked for over 30 years as a trainer and coach focusing on self-leadership, leadership, and communication. Trained by renowned figures such as Vera F. Birkenbihl, Shirzad Chamine, Maja Storch, and others, he has dedicated his career to helping people find their path and follow it authentically. His clients include leaders from top politics, business, and the public sector.
Originally from Vorarlberg and now based in Vienna, he has held several political functions and understands the challenge of conveying complex topics simply and clearly.
Since most results in organizations are achieved through communication, Ronny is especially committed to improving it. Better communication reduces transaction costs caused by misunderstandings, endless repetitions, unproductive debates about the unchangeable, and poorly resolved conflicts.
courses.ronny_quote: Good communication requires inner clarity, the courage to be direct, assertiveness, and methods for leading groups.
courses.hero_title:
Your mind has brought you this far.
Now it’s time to go further.
courses.hero_subtitle: The community and platform for gifted minds.

contact.title: Do you have questions?
contact.description: We are available for questions, feedback, or collaboration opportunities. Let us know how we can help!

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.text: ALISMA brings together young women in STEM – at community events like the WAFF event, with inspiring workshops, and through our own diploma project competition. Our mini-books spark curiosity for technology among the youngest and break stereotypes. Through campaigns, school projects, and role models, we create visibility, opportunities, and a strong network.

mission.text:
Our mission is to strengthen and connect girls and women in STEM fields and open doors to technical careers.
We aim not only to inform but also to inspire – with role models, projects, and encounters that encourage and break stereotypes.
ALISMA stands for a community where diversity is lived, successes are celebrated, and every young woman receives the support she needs to shape her own path in technology and science.

alismaJoin.title: Join us!
alismaJoin.leadStrong: At ALISMA, every voice and every idea matters.
alismaJoin.lead: Whether you’re an HTL student looking for like-minded peers, a role model wanting to inspire young women, or a school ready to work with us for more equality – we’re happy to have you.
alismaJoin.body: Be part of a committed community that supports each other, shares knowledge, and opens new opportunities. Sign up for our newsletter, join our WhatsApp community, or get involved as a volunteer – your contribution makes a difference.

lp_subtitle: ALISMA connects girls and young women in STEM, creating spaces for meeting, mutual support, and inspiration for new paths in technology and science.
wer_wir_sind_text: ALISMA is an association founded by six HTL students, empowering women and girls in STEM. We promote networking, break down prejudices, and create opportunities – from school workshops and role models to major community events. Our goal is to build a supportive community where everyone can contribute ideas, grow, and shape their own future.

community_about.title: What Our Community Is All About
community_about.intro: Our community connects girls and women in STEM, offering a space for networking, mutual support, and shared growth. It’s where learning, empowerment, and lasting friendships happen.

benefits.networking: Connect with like-minded people and expand your network
benefits.support: Find encouragement and guidance from a supportive community
benefits.empowerment: Gain confidence to take on new challenges and leadership roles
benefits.learning: Access opportunities to learn, share knowledge, and grow together

members.sectionIntro: Meet the people who shape ALISMA — students, graduates, role models and partners who stand for connection, learning and empowerment.

banner.title: Our Story, in Chapters
banner.subtitle: A scroll story about how ALISMA empowers girls and young women in STEM across Austria’s HTLs.

intro.title: By HTL Girls. For HTL Girls.
intro.body: ALISMA began as HTL-Girls — a small group with a big mission: connect, empower, and make girls visible in technical education. Today we are a growing community that opens doors, shares opportunities, and turns curiosity into confidence.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: We strengthen and connect girls and young women in STEM. We inform and inspire — through role models, projects, and encounters that encourage, break stereotypes, and celebrate success.

programs.title: What We Do
programs.body: From community events and the WAFF showcase to workshops at schools, a diploma project competition, and our mini-book series featuring real women in STEM — ALISMA creates spaces where learning meets belonging.

impact.title: Impact You Can Feel
impact.body: Hundreds of students engaged, 974 survey voices from 11 HTLs, and lasting connections formed. We make pathways into HTL — and beyond — more visible and more accessible.

together.title: Community — Our Power
together.body: ALISMA is a safe, vibrant network across Austrian HTLs. We champion diversity, support emotional competence, and invite boys, teachers, and partners into constructive dialogue.

cta.title: Join the Movement
cta.body: Become part of the ALISMA community: get updates, join our WhatsApp group, mentor, or support an event. Your voice can change someone’s path.

hero.title: HTL Girls Community – Stronger Together
hero.text: The HTL Girls Community is a space by students for students. We connect through a shared WhatsApp group, exchange experiences, and invite members to exclusive community events.

why.lead: At HTLs, girls are often in the minority. Visible role models are missing, expectations are stereotypical – and sometimes you just feel 'different'.

points.notAlone: We show: you are not alone.
points.exchange: We provide space for exchange and mutual motivation.
points.visibility: We create visibility for girls who love technology.

why.goal: The goal is that every student experiences: she is part of a bigger movement – and her ideas and talents matter.

whatsapp.text: The heart of our community is the WhatsApp group. Here you are always connected with other HTL students.

bullets.questions: Ask questions about school, technology, and projects
bullets.tips: Share tips for diploma projects, internships, and applications
bullets.peers: Find peers who share your enthusiasm

aria.cta: Switch to the HTL Girls WhatsApp community

exchange.text: We believe in the power of mutual support. In the community, friendships, study groups, and creative ideas emerge. Every voice counts – from the first year to graduation.

events.text: As a member, you receive direct invitations to community meetups and events – with topics that really matter to you.

bullets.roleModels: Exchange with role models and mentors
bullets.workshops: Workshops and sessions on current topics

aria.cta: Go to the next community events

join.text: Join us and experience how powerful community can be. Whether for everyday exchange, inspiration, or the next event invitation – you are welcome in the HTL Girls Community.

seo.title: HTL Girls Community – Projects & Exchange
seo.description: The HTL Girls Community connects students via WhatsApp, fosters exchange, and invites to events. Join now and grow stronger together.
